title: Please help determining this font
content:
seen this on alot of rock band t shirts, can’t figure out what it is seems to of appeared more in the late 80’s early 90’s.

the newer font tar-pits is a knock off of this but isn’t quite right.

thanks,

-tim

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [VR023.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080620045517/http:/typophile.com/files/VR023.jpg) | 34.05 KB |

 [‹ What font is this? Help would be appreciated](http://web.archive.org/web/20080620045517/http:/typophile.com/node/46497 "Go to previous forum topic") [Want to know of this font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080620045517/http:/typophile.com/node/46509 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tim tamblin

comments.content:
I looked in a number of places, including Part 14 of the Script Font ID Guide, but couldn’t find an exact match. However, there are many very similar fonts in the [Script\>Trash category at Dafont](http://web.archive.org/web/20080620045517/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=605&page=3&nb_ppp=50&text=INTEGRITY). (I picked a page that has several that I think are quite similar. See what you think.)

- Mike Yanega
